mapper.insert: insert into tb_comment2(sns_idx, user_id, cmt_content) values(#{sns_idx}, #{user_id} ,#{cmt_content})
mapper.select: select b.user_id, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, b.cmt_content, a.user_nick from tb_user a inner join tb_comment2 b on(a.user_id = b.user_id) where b.sns_idx=#{sns_idx}
